articles.description: Shark Tank India’s first season commenced on TV in December 2021. It featured Ashneer Grover, Anupam Mittal, Aman Gupta, Namita Thapar, Vineeta Singh, Peyush Bansal and Gazal Alagh as seven sharks aka judges.
articles.content:
• Shark Tank India is based on original American show
  • The show is expected to come up with its season 2 soon
After garnering much appreciation and love from the viewers, th… [+2280 chars]

articles.title: Toddler’s cute imitation of Allu Arjun’s hook step in Srivalli has the Internet gushing. Viral video - India Today
articles.description: As the song Srivalli plays on a TV, the little one goes around the room trying to copy Allu Arjun’s sliding hook step.
